e="preserve">Al Matthews (November 21, 1942 – September 22, 2018) was an American actor and singer. He was born in Brooklyn, New York, but was based in Spain. Matthews was best known for his rolee as Gunnery Sergeant Apone in the James Cameron movie "Aliens" (1986).
Matthews was found dead on September 22, 2018 at his Orihuela, Spain home, aged 75.
